name: py-psutil
description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: geopm
dependent_to.description:
GEOPM is an extensible power management framework targeting HPC. The
GEOPM package provides libgeopm, libgeopmpolicy and applications
geopmctl and geopmpolicy, as well as tools for postprocessing. GEOPM is
designed to be extended for new control algorithms and new hardware
power management features via its plugin infrastructure. Note: GEOPM
interfaces with hardware using Model Specific Registers (MSRs). For
propper usage make sure MSRs are made available directly or via the msr-
safe kernel module by your administrator.

dependent_to.name: py-adb-enhanced
dependent_to.description:
ADB-Enhanced is a Swiss-army knife for Android testing and development.
A command-line interface to trigger various scenarios like screen
rotation, battery saver mode, data saver mode, doze mode, permission
grant/revocation.

dependent_to.name: py-pyaestro
dependent_to.description:
A collection of data classes, data structures, and other utility classes
that are aimed for use in workflow

dependent_to.name: py-geeup
dependent_to.description: Simple Client for Earth Engine Uploads with Selenium Support.

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-ucx-py
dependent_to.description:
UCX-Py is the Python interface for UCX, a low-level high-performance
networking library. UCX and UCX-Py supports several transport methods
including InfiniBand and NVLink while still using traditional networking
protocols like TCP.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-flufl-lock
dependent_to.description: NFS-safe file locking with timeouts for POSIX and Windows

dependent_to.name: gpdb
dependent_to.description:
Greenplum Database (GPDB) is an advanced, fully featured, open source
data warehouse, based on PostgreSQL. It provides powerful and rapid
analytics on petabyte scale data volumes. Uniquely geared toward big
data analytics, Greenplum Database is powered by the world's most
advanced cost-based query optimizer delivering high analytical query
performance on large data volumes.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-openfiles
dependent_to.description:
A plugin for the pytest framework that allows developers to detect
whether any file handles or other file-like objects were inadvertently
left open at the end of a unit test

dependent_to.name: py-memory-profiler
dependent_to.description: A module for monitoring memory usage of a python program

dependent_to.name: py-libensemble
dependent_to.description: Library for managing ensemble-like collections of computations.

dependent_to.name: py-torch
dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-petastorm
dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.

dependent_to.name: py-gpustat
dependent_to.description: An utility to monitor NVIDIA GPU status and usage.
